projects.title: Horned Beasts
projects.description: The most amazing application I had opportunity to work with. I've learned many codes and methods and my code was reviewed by awesome curator. Application handles images of horned beasts and allowes the user to choose his favorite beast and also shows the beasts according to thier horns number.
